web_snippets: In 2018 Lawrence Longo ate 365 burgers at different restaurants all around Los Angeles. Lawrence Longo is known for Off the Menu (2016). More at IMDbPro.
Lawrence Longo, founder of Off the Menu and driving force behind brands like Prince Street Pizza, Irv's Burgers, and The Bar Next Door, joins Give an Ovation.
